resources.string: PlantDex is the application that was developed as a proof of concept for the study of the research group of Gerarld Merales, Zoe Pasiliao, and Michael Zamoras. The main highlight is the Classifier section of this application, with this application, anyone can take a photo of a plant and it will be automatically classified by the image classifier module that is being hosted on the same server as the app. Do note that the accuracy of the classification would be highly dependent on the quality of the image as well as the datasets that were used to train the module.

A few reminders when using this app. The application would require GPS Location, Camera, and Storage Permissions to run properly. These permissions are required for the Mapping and Classifying Module to work. Also, when classifying an image make sure the image is well-focused on the plant\'s leaf and for best results please take or provide a picture with decent lighting and quality.
Please click the search button to search

Are we helpful? Kindly rate the PlantDex application. (1-Needs Improvement to 5-Very Good)

PlantDex is a mobile application that uses a server hosted image classifier in identifying plant species using images from a user. With that, the group would really appreciate feedbacks from you, our dear users to improve our services. Kindly write down your feedback below. Thank you!
You have successfully submitted a contribution! The plant data will be checked by the administrators and changes will be made to the database accordingly. Thank you for contributing!
